categories.category: Information technology consulting firms of the United States

institution.bdy:
Explore Consulting is a software, information technology, database and web design firm based in
Bellevue, Washington .
History
Founded in 2001 by Steve Jones and Jeremy DeSpain, Explore Consulting1 provides expertise in information technology and Software as a Service ( SaaS). As of March, 2008, Explore Consulting services over 250 clients and employs over 30 people.
Services
Explore consults with companies on information technology projects and Software-as-a-Service, and builds software applications including web sites. Explore helps companies increase their information reliability and process efficiency.
Explore is a leading reseller and integrator of
NetSuite ’s ERP/ CRM Software-as-a-Service applications. Explore is a Microsoft .NET solution provider and
Oracle Corporation partner.
Explore provides expertise in project leadership, analysis, design and development for software projects of any size. In addition to web design and software development, Explore also offers Business Intelligence (BI), Data Warehousing design and development and mobile systems design and development.
Clients include such
Fortune 500 names as Microsoft, Safeco Insurance and
Nordstrom but also include leading growth companies such as Dash Navigation, Clickable and BabyLegs.
Awards and Industry Recognition
In 2007, Explore was named to the Inc. 50002, ranking 3,520 nationally, with a three-year average annual sales growth of 83.8%. Also in 2007, Explore was named to the
Puget Sound
Business Journal’s 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Washington State3, ranking 42 out of 100, with a three-year average annual sales growth of 83.8%.
In 2008, Explore also made the Inc. 50004, ranking 1,445 nationally, with average annual sales growth of 261% over the prior three years. Of the top companies located in Seattle-Tacoma-Bellevue, Explore Consulting ranked 40 out of 50.
